sentences.sContent: This photo of the towers was taken during wintertime.
sentences.sContent_eng: This photo of the towers was taken during wintertime.
sentences.sCn: 这些钙华塔的照片是在冬季拍摄的。

sentences.sContent: For instance, an ear of corn will cost about 10 cents in the summer and nearly a dollar in the wintertime.
sentences.sContent_eng: For instance, an ear of corn will cost about 10 cents in the summer and nearly a dollar in the wintertime.
sentences.sCn: 举例来说，一个玉米棒在夏季的时候售10美分左右，而在冬季的时候差不多售1美元。

sentences.sContent: As a result, sea ice extent for the Arctic actually peaked on March 31, 2010—the latest peak of wintertime Arctic sea ice extent in the satellite record.
sentences.sContent_eng: As a result, sea ice extent for the Arctic actually peaked on March 31, 2010—the latest peak of wintertime Arctic sea ice extent in the satellite record.
sentences.sCn: 结果导致2010年北极的海冰范围是在3月31日达到峰值——这是有卫星记录以来北极海冰范围最晚的冬季峰值。

words.tran: 作过冬准备；在…装御寒设备
为…作过冬准备；使适应冬季使用；使防冻

trans.tranOther: the time when it is winter
